Description: Create all SQL migration files for: Users, ScrapeJobs, AnalysisJobs, PredictionJobs, Articles, NewsSources, AnalysisResults, Predictions, APIKeys, AuditLogs. Use TimescaleDB hypertables for time-series data. Files: /db/migrations/. Acceptance Criteria: All tables created with proper indexes; Foreign key constraints in place; Hypertables configured; Migrations can be run and rolled back cleanly

Implement CreateUser, GetUser, GetUserByEmail, UpdateUser, DeleteUser in storage/postgres.go. Files: /app/internal/storage/postgres.go. Acceptance Criteria: All CRUD operations working; Password hashing with bcrypt; Email uniqueness enforced; Unit tests for each operation

Connect the register handler to actually save users to the database. Files: /app/internal/api/handlers.go. Acceptance Criteria: User saved to database on registration; JWT token returned on success; Proper error handling for duplicate emails; Password validation

Connect the login handler to verify credentials from database. Files: /app/internal/api/handlers.go. Acceptance Criteria: Password verified against bcrypt hash; JWT access + refresh tokens returned; Failed attempts logged; Proper error messages

Implement CRUD for ScrapeJobs, AnalysisJobs, and PredictionJobs in storage/postgres.go. Files: /app/internal/storage/postgres.go. Acceptance Criteria: Create, Read, Update, Delete for all job types; Status tracking; User ownership enforced; Pagination support

Summary: Wire job endpoints to return DB data
Description: Update all job GET endpoints to query actual data from database. Files: /app/internal/api/handlers.go. Acceptance Criteria: GET endpoints return user's jobs; Pagination working; Filtering by status

Implement GET /news/articles endpoint with pagination and filtering. Files: /app/internal/api/news_handlers.go. Acceptance Criteria: Pagination with limit/offset; Filter by source, date, category; Sort by date, relevance

Implement real WebSocket message routing for job status updates. Files: /app/internal/api/handlers.go. Acceptance Criteria: Client can subscribe to job updates; Status changes broadcast in real-time; Connection heartbeat

Implement GET /news/articles/search with PostgreSQL full-text search. Files: /app/internal/api/news_handlers.go. Acceptance Criteria: Full-text search across title, description, content; Relevance ranking; Highlighting

Summary: Add API rate limiting per user
Description: Implement rate limiting middleware using Redis. Files: /app/internal/api/middleware.go. Acceptance Criteria: Configurable limits per endpoint; Per-user tracking via JWT; 429 response with retry-after header
Add proxy endpoints for Kalshi API. Files: /app/internal/api/kalshi_handlers.go. Acceptance Criteria: GET /kalshi/events proxied; Caching implemented; Error handling
Add /metrics endpoint for Prometheus scraping. Files: /app/cmd/api/main.go. Acceptance Criteria: Request count by endpoint; Response time histograms; Error rates
Perform load testing and optimize bottlenecks. Acceptance Criteria: Load test with 100 concurrent users; p95 response time < 200ms; Document performance baselines

Finalize Docker and deployment configs for production. Files: /deploy/docker-compose.yml. Acceptance Criteria: Production docker-compose ready; Environment variables documented; Health checks configured

Create skeleton/shimmer loading states for all panels. Files: /website/src/components/panels/*.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Skeleton component for each panel type; Smooth shimmer animation; Accessible (aria-busy)

Summary: Prepare auth service for backend integration
Description: Refactor auth.js to support backend API calls. Files: /website/src/utils/auth.js. Acceptance Criteria: API client methods for login/register; Token storage prepared; Backward compatible

Replace localStorage auth with actual backend API calls. Blocked by: BE-003, BE-004. Files: /website/src/utils/auth.js, Login.jsx, Signup.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Login calls backend; Tokens stored securely; Auto-refresh

Summary: Replace direct Polymarket API calls with backend proxy
Description: Route all Polymarket API calls through our backend proxy. Blocked by: BE-008. Files: /website/src/services/polymarketAPI.js. Acceptance Criteria: All calls go through backend; Fallback handling; Caching
Add WebSocket connection for real-time job status updates. Blocked by: BE-008. Files: /website/src/services/jobsAPI.js. Acceptance Criteria: WebSocket established on login; Fallback to polling
Finish implementing the buy/sell panel. Files: /website/src/components/panels/BuySellPanel.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Order form; Real-time cost calculation; Order preview; Risk warnings
Implement real trade history display. Files: /website/src/components/panels/MarketTradesPanel.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Recent trades displayed; Real-time updates; Trade direction color coding
Finish the WIP chart mode tabs. Files: /website/src/components/MarketDetailDock.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: All chart modes functional; Smooth tab transitions; Responsive sizing
Implement toast notification system. Files: /website/src/components/Toast.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Toast variants (error, success, warning, info); Auto-dismiss; Accessible
Set up testing framework and write unit tests. Files: /website/src/**/*.test.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Vitest configured; 70% coverage target
Make the terminal responsive. Files: /website/src/App.jsx, styles.css. Acceptance Criteria: Tablet breakpoint (768px); Mobile breakpoint (480px); Collapsible sidebar
Improve accessibility compliance. Files: /website/src/components/**/*.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: ARIA labels; Keyboard navigation; Focus management; Color contrast
Set up Playwright and write E2E tests. Files: /website/e2e/*.spec.ts. Acceptance Criteria: Playwright configured; Login flow test; CI integration
Create the ML project structure. Files: /ml/. Acceptance Criteria: Python environment; Directory structure; Integration points defined
Replace keyword counting with real NLP sentiment analysis. Files: /ml/models/sentiment.py. Acceptance Criteria: VADER or TextBlob; >70% accuracy; Integration with Go analyzer
Extract entities from articles. Files: /ml/models/ner.py. Acceptance Criteria: spaCy NER; Extract PERSON, ORG, EVENT; JSON output
Create first version of price prediction model. Files: /ml/models/price_predictor.py. Acceptance Criteria: Features: price, volume, sentiment; >55% directional accuracy; Inference <100ms
Calculate correlations between markets. Files: /ml/features/correlation.py. Acceptance Criteria: Pearson correlation; Rolling windows; Daily recalculation
Implement time series forecasting. Files: /ml/models/timeseries.py. Acceptance Criteria: Prophet or ARIMA; Forecast horizons: 1h, 4h, 24h, 7d; Confidence intervals
Calculate realized and implied volatility. Files: /ml/features/volatility.py. Acceptance Criteria: Realized volatility; GARCH model; Integration with Greeks
Combine multiple models into ensemble. Files: /ml/models/ensemble.py. Acceptance Criteria: Weighted average; Dynamic weight adjustment; A/B testing framework
Create evaluation pipeline. Files: /ml/evaluation/metrics.py. Acceptance Criteria: Accuracy, precision, recall, F1; Brier score; Calibration plots

Summary: Design TimescaleDB schema for price data
Description: Design optimal schema for storing market price history. Files: /db/migrations/003_price_data.sql. Acceptance Criteria: Hypertable; Efficient OHLC queries; Retention policy
Create pipeline to ingest prices from Polymarket and Kalshi. Files: /data/pipelines/price_ingestion.py. Acceptance Criteria: Fetch every 5 minutes; Handle rate limits; Data quality checks
Add OHLC candlestick chart visualization. Files: /website/src/components/CandlestickChart.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Candlestick rendering; Time aggregation; Volume bars
Add zoom, pan, and tooltip interactions. Files: /website/src/components/PriceChart.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Mouse wheel zoom; Click and drag pan; Tooltip on hover; Touch support
Implement volume profile and order book depth visualization. Files: /website/src/components/DepthChart.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Bid/ask depth; Volume at price histogram; Real-time updates
Visualize correlation matrix as interactive heatmap. Files: /website/src/components/CorrelationHeatmap.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: Color scale; Click for details; Filter by category
Implement technical indicators overlay. Files: /website/src/utils/indicators.js. Acceptance Criteria: Moving averages; RSI; Bollinger Bands; Indicator toggle UI

Summary: Real-time WebSocket for all watched markets
Description: Extend WebSocket to stream prices for all markets. Files: /website/src/services/polymarketWebSocket.js. Acceptance Criteria: Subscribe to multiple markets; Efficient batching; Reconnection handling
Create dashboard to monitor system performance. Files: /website/src/components/panels/PerformanceDashboard.jsx. Acceptance Criteria: API response times; WebSocket latency; Data freshness; Error rates
